bill.summary:
Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to take a series of actions to reduce unnecessary costs and administrative burdens in the health care system, including a grant program for states to establish commissions targeting such costs.
